nodes.text: Doomsday Cloud was a notorious group of well-established smugglers that was active during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. The group wrought havoc and destruction without mercy, swallowing all in their path. They were enemies of the Ithorian antiques dealer Dok-Ondar.
Doomsday Cloud was first created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
